title.en: Aspiration of the Mahāmudrā of Definitive Meaning

text.en: Namo guru!
text.en-trans: namo guru

text.en: All you masters and yidam deities of the various maṇḍalas,
text.en-trans: lama nam dang yidam kyilkhor lha

text.en: Buddhas and your bodhisattva heirs throughout the ten directions and three times:
text.en-trans: chok chu dü sum gyalwa sé dangché

text.en: Turn your loving attention towards me and grant your blessings,
text.en-trans: dak la tser gong dak gi mönlam nam

text.en: So that all may be conducive to the fulfilment of my aspirations.
text.en-trans: jizhin drubpé tün gyur jinlab dzö

text.en: May streams of virtue, unsullied by the three conceptual spheres,
text.en-trans: dak dang tayé semchen tamché kyi

text.en: Sprung forth from snowy peaks—my own pure intentions and actions,
text.en-trans: samjor namdak gangri lé kyepé

text.en: And those of all other sentient beings, who are infinite in number—
text.en-trans: khor sum nyokmé gé tsok chugyün nam

text.en: All merge into the vast ocean of the buddhas’ four kāyas.
text.en-trans: gyalwa ku zhi gyatsor juk gyur chik

text.en: Meanwhile, for as long as I have not yet reached that level of attainment,
text.en-trans: jisi dé matobpa desi du

text.en: Throughout the course of my many lives in one rebirth after another,
text.en-trans: kyé dang kyewa tserab küntu yang

text.en: May I never so much as hear the words ‘wrongdoing’ or ‘suffering’,
text.en-trans: dik dang dukngal dra yang mi drak ching

text.en: And may I enjoy the splendour of oceanic happiness and virtue.
text.en-trans: dé gé gyatsö pal la chöpar shok

text.en: Having found supreme freedom and advantage, with faith, diligence, and wisdom,
text.en-trans: daljor chok tob dé tsön sherab den

text.en: May I rely upon excellent spiritual friends, receive the elixir of instruction,
text.en-trans: shenyen zang ten dampé chü tob né

text.en: And accomplish it in the proper way without any impediment,
text.en-trans: tsulzhin drub la barché machipar

text.en: Putting the genuine Dharma into practice throughout all my lives.
text.en-trans: tserab küntu damchö chöpar shok

text.en: Study of scripture and reasoning liberates from the veils of unknowing;
text.en-trans: lung rik töpé mi shedrib lé drol

text.en: Contemplating instructions overcomes the dense darkness of doubt;
text.en-trans: mengak sampé tetsom münnak chom

text.en: And the light arisen from meditation illuminates reality just as it is—
text.en-trans: gom jung ö kyi neluk jizhin sal

text.en: May the radiance of these three forms of wisdom expand and increase.
text.en-trans: sherab sum gyi nangwa gyepar shok

text.en: The ground is the two truths, free from eternalist and nihilistic extremes;
text.en-trans: takché tadral den nyi zhi yi dön

text.en: The supreme path, twofold accumulation, unlimited by projection and denial,
text.en-trans: drokur tadral tsok nyi lam chok gi

text.en: Brings the fruition, twofold benefit, free from the extremes of existence and quiescence—
text.en-trans: sizhi tadral dön nyi dré tobpé

text.en: May I encounter this Dharma that is without error or confusion.
text.en-trans: gol chuk mepé chö dang trepar shok

text.en: Upon the basis of purification, mind’s nature of clarity and emptiness in union,
text.en-trans: jang zhi semnyi saltong zungjuk la

text.en: May that which purifies, the great adamantine yoga of Mahāmudrā,
text.en-trans: jongjé chakchen dorjé naljor ché

text.en: Purify its objects, the stains of adventitious delusion,
text.en-trans: jangja lobur trulpé drima nam

text.en: And, as a result, may I realize the immaculate dharmakāya.
text.en-trans: jang dré dridral chöku ngön gyur shok

text.en: Eliminating misconceptions of the ground brings assurance in the view;
text.en-trans: zhi la drondok chöpa tawé deng

text.en: To sustain that view without distraction is the key point of meditation;
text.en-trans: dé la ma yeng kyongwa gompé né

text.en: And to train in all of meditation’s facets is the supreme form of action—
text.en-trans: gom dön kün la tsal jong chöpé chok

text.en: May I possess the confident assurance of view, meditation and conduct.
text.en-trans: ta gom chöpé deng dang denpar shok

text.en: All phenomena are but apparitions of the mind;
text.en-trans: chö nam tamché sem kyi namtrul té

text.en: Mind itself is without mind, empty of mind’s essence—
text.en-trans: sem ni semmé sem kyi ngowö tong

text.en: Empty yet unrestricted, appearing in any way at all.
text.en-trans: tong zhing magak chiryang nangwa té

text.en: Having examined it well, may I determine the basis.
text.en-trans: lekpar tak né zhi tsa chöpar shok

text.en: I mistake my own perceptions, which have never been real, for objects,
text.en-trans: yö manyongwé rangnang yul du trul

text.en: And through ignorance’s power, confuse my own awareness for a self.
text.en-trans: marik wang gi rangrig dak tu trul

text.en: Through duality’s force, I roam the arena of saṃsāric existence.
text.en-trans: nyidzin wang gi sipé long du khyam

text.en: May I thoroughly eradicate ignorance and delusion.
text.en-trans: marik trulpé tsé dar chöpar shok

text.en: It is not existent, for even the buddhas have not seen it.
text.en-trans: yöpa mayin gyalwé kyang ma zik

text.en: It is not nonexistent, for it’s the basis of all saṃsāra and nirvāṇa.
text.en-trans: mepa mayin khordé kün gyi zhi

text.en: This is not a contradiction; it’s the middle way of unity.
text.en-trans: galdu mayin zungjuk umé lam

text.en: May I realize mind’s nature, free from limiting extremes.
text.en-trans: tadral sem kyi chönyi tokpar shok

text.en: There is nothing to point to, saying, “It is this.”
text.en-trans: di yin zhepa gang gi tsönpamé

text.en: Nor can there be denial as in, “This it is not.”
text.en-trans: di min zheja gang gi kakpamé

text.en: Dharmatā, beyond the mind, is uncompounded.
text.en-trans: lo lé depé chönyi dümajé

text.en: May I determine the bounds of genuine reality.
text.en-trans: yangdak dön gyi ta ni ngepar shok

text.en: Not realizing this, I drift about in saṃsāra’s ocean.
text.en-trans: di nyi ma tok khorwé gyatsor khor

text.en: When I do realize it, buddhahood lies nowhere else.
text.en-trans: di nyi tok na sangye zhen namé

text.en: Everything is this; there is nothing else besides.
text.en-trans: tamché di yin di min gangyang mé

text.en: May I know the hidden point of the all-ground, dharmatā.
text.en-trans: chönyi künzhi tsang ni rigpar shok

text.en: Appearances are mind; emptiness is also the mind.
text.en-trans: nang yang sem la tong yang sem yin té

text.en: Realization is mind; delusion too is one’s own mind.
text.en-trans: tok kyang sem la trul yang rang gi sem

text.en: What’s arisen is mind; what’s ceased is also mind.
text.en-trans: kyé kyang sem la gak kyang sem yinpé

text.en: May I eliminate all misconceptions within the mind.
text.en-trans: drondok tamché sem la chöpar shok

text.en: Unspoilt by deliberate, mind-fabricated meditation,
text.en-trans: löjé tsolwé gom gyi ma lé ching

text.en: And unswayed by the winds of ordinary preoccupation,
text.en-trans: tamal dudzi lung gi makyöpar

text.en: May I learn how to settle naturally without contrivance,
text.en-trans: machö nyukma rangbab jok shepé

text.en: And skilfully sustain the practice of mind’s ultimate point.
text.en-trans: sem dön nyamlen khé shing kyongwar shok

text.en: With waves of coarse and subtle thought naturally calmed,
text.en-trans: tra rak tokpé walab rang sar zhi

text.en: And the river of mind unmoving, spontaneously stilled;
text.en-trans: yomé sem kyi chuwo ngang gi né

text.en: Uncontaminated by the taints of lethargy and dullness,
text.en-trans: jing muk nyokpé drima dang dralwé

text.en: May the ocean of śamatha remain steadfastly inert.
text.en-trans: zhiné gyatso mi yo tenpar shok

text.en: When looking repeatedly at unobservable mind,
text.en-trans: tarmé sem la yangyang tepé tsé

text.en: The point of non-seeing is vividly seen, just as it is.
text.en-trans: tongmé dön ni jizhin lhak ger tong

text.en: And indecision—is it? or is it not?—is cut right through.
text.en-trans: yin min dön la tetsom chöpa nyi

text.en: May I recognize my very own nature, without delusion.
text.en-trans: trulmé rang ngo rang gi shepar shok

text.en: Looking at objects, I see them as objectless mind;
text.en-trans: yul la tepé yulmé sem su tong

text.en: Looking at mind, mind is absent, empty of essence;
text.en-trans: sem la tepé semmé ngowö tong

text.en: Looking at both, duality is liberated there and then—
text.en-trans: nyi la tepé nyidzin rang sar drol

text.en: May I realize mind’s true nature, which is clear light.
text.en-trans: ösal sem kyi neluk tokpar shok

text.en: This absence of mental engagement is Mahāmudrā.
text.en-trans: yi jé dralwa di ni chakgya ché

text.en: The freedom from extremes is the great Middle Way.
text.en-trans: ta dang dralwa uma chenpo yin

text.en: Since all is here included, it is also Great Perfection.
text.en-trans: di ni kündü dzogchen zhé kyangja

text.en: May I acquire the confidence of knowing one and realizing all.
text.en-trans: chik shé kün dön tokpé deng tob shok

text.en: Great bliss without attachment continues uninterruptedly;
text.en-trans: zhenpa mepé dechen gyünché mé

text.en: Clear light without conceptual identification is unobscured;
text.en-trans: tsen dzin mepé ösal drib yokdral

text.en: Non-conceptuality beyond the mind is spontaneously present—
text.en-trans: lo lé depé mi tok lhün gyi drub

text.en: May effortless experience emerge in a never-ending flow.
text.en-trans: tsolmé nyamnyong gyünché mepar shok

text.en: Attachment to positive experience is liberated of its own accord;
text.en-trans: zang zhen nyam kyi dzinpa rang sar drol

text.en: Negative thinking and delusion are purified within the natural expanse;
text.en-trans: ngen tok trulpa rangzhin ying su dak

text.en: And ordinary awareness is neither shunned nor sought, neither lost nor gained—
text.en-trans: tamal shepa panglang dral tobmé

text.en: May I realize the truth of dharmatā that is beyond conceptual elaboration.
text.en-trans: trödral chönyi denpa tokpar shok

text.en: Although beings’ true nature has always been awakened,
text.en-trans: drowé rangzhin taktu sangye kyang

text.en: In their non-recognition, they wander in saṃsāra without end.
text.en-trans: ma tok wang gi tamé khorwar khyam

text.en: For these sentient beings whose misery knows no bounds,
text.en-trans: dukngal muta mepé semchen la

text.en: May I develop a compassion that is unbearably intense.
text.en-trans: zömé nyingjé gyü la kyewar shok

text.en: The strength of unbearable compassion is unrestricted,
text.en-trans: zömé nyingjé tsal yang magakpé

text.en: And in this love, the reality of the empty essence laid bare.
text.en-trans: tsé dü ngowo tong dön jenpar shar

text.en: May I constantly cultivate this supreme, unerring path of unity
text.en-trans: zungjuk golsa dralwé lam chok di

text.en: And may I never be apart from it, by day or by night.
text.en-trans: dralmé nyintsen küntu gompar shok

text.en: With sight and heightened perception born of meditation,
text.en-trans: gom tob lé jung chen dang ngönshé dang

text.en: May I bring beings to maturity, fully purify buddha realms,
text.en-trans: semchen min jé sangye zhing rab jang

text.en: And fulfil the aspirations to accomplish a buddha’s qualities—
text.en-trans: sangye chö nam drubpé mönlam dzok

text.en: Thus may I awaken, with perfecting, maturing and purifying all complete.
text.en-trans: dzok min jang sum tarchin sangye shok

text.en: Through the compassion of the buddhas and their heirs in every direction,
text.en-trans: chok chü gyalwa sé ché tukjé dang

text.en: And the power of whatever wholesome virtue there might be,
text.en-trans: namkar gewa jinyé yöpé tü

text.en: May my own and all other beings’ purest aspirations
text.en-trans: detar dak dang semchen tamché kyi

text.en: Be fulfilled, exactly in accordance with our wishes.
text.en-trans: mönlam namdak jizhin drub gyur chik
